sentences.en: And so, a lot of people see this as a sort of … or create a scenario, an Orwellian scenario, a Big Brother type scenario but I don't concur.
sentences.cn: 所以，大多数人会把这个现象视为一种……或者说创作一幕剧情，一幕奥威尔式或是“老大哥”式的剧情，但是我并不同意这样的看法。

sentences.en: Butler and Stone concur that the war threw people's lives into a moral relief.
sentences.cn: 巴特勒和斯通一致认为这场战争使人们的生命得到了道义上的解脱。

sentences.en: Did all the members concur in getting a bank loan?
sentences.cn: 委员们是否都同意向银行贷款.

sentences.en: I concur absolutely with your decision.
I concur with him in many points.
sentences.cn: 在许多方面,我是同意他的.

sentences.en: I concur with your views in giving him the first prize.
sentences.cn: 我同意你的意见给他一等奖.

sentences.en: I fully concur with him in this matter.
sentences.cn: 我和他在这件事情完全意见一致.

sentences.en: I'll do nothing that we both don't concur on, from now on and forever.
sentences.cn: 从现在起,凡不是我们俩一致同意的事,我都不干,而且永远如此.

sentences.en: Local feeling does not necessarily concur with the press.
sentences.cn: 当地人的感受未必与媒体一致。

sentences.en: Many people's feelings concur on the subject of freedom.
sentences.cn: 许多人的感情,在自由的问题上是一致的.

sentences.en: My political views concur with his.
sentences.cn: 我的政治见解和他一致.

sentences.en: My political views concur with yours.
sentences.cn: 我的政治观点跟你的一致.

sentences.en: The brothers rarely concur on any issues.
sentences.cn: 他们兄弟在任何问题上都很少有一致的意见.

sentences.en: The designs of structure and shape are achieved perfectly and concur rent ly.
sentences.cn: 并使结构设计与造型设计同时得到较完美的体现.

sentences.en: Wealth and happiness do not always concur.
sentences.cn: 财富与幸福并非总是并存的.

sentences.en: Would you concur with such a proposal?
sentences.cn: 您同意这样的建议 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 并发的；一致的；同时发生的
[数] 共点；同时发生的事件
一致；合作；同时发生（concur的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 同时发生； 意见相同， 一致
trans.tran_en: to agree with someone or have the same opinion as them

trans.tran_cn: 同意，互助，同时发生，共同作用
